name: Old Monterrey
description:
In this exciting platform video game, you will be transported to a very old version of the city of Monterrey, where the adorable goats have been trapped by the fearsome aliens. As a brave hero, you will have to go through all the levels to free the goats and save the city.

With pixel-art graphics and easy-to-use controls, “Old Monterrey” will keep you focused on the screen as you fight for the freedom of the goats. Don't wait any longer and start your adventure today!

Controls (On screen touch controller):
Move left: Left Button
Move right: Right Button
Jump: Up Button (Double tap for additional jump)
